page.title: 06Traffic on the A428
page.content: The A428 which goes through the length of the village is a busy road connecting Northampton and Rugby. This creates safety problems as the road has two sharp bends and at one point there is not a footpath on one side of the road. Lorries have shed their loads when travelling too fast around the bends. Once directly through a home's window. On several occassions lorries had difficulty in passing where the road narrows. There were two accidents this summer where children were knocked over by vehicles, fortunately no serious injuries occured. The road becomes heavily congested when traffic is diverted from the M1 motorway due to maintainance or accidents.
